abstract: Jerry Yang, who, as chief executive of Yahoo, resisted a takeover bid from Microsoft only to later ask that merger talks resume, said he was stepping down, The New York Times’s Brad Stone and Claire Cain Miller reported.
lead_paragraph: Jerry Yang, who, as chief executive of Yahoo, resisted a takeover bid from Microsoft only to later ask that merger talks resume, said he was stepping down, The New York Times’s Brad Stone and Claire Cain Miller reported.

headline.main: Jerry Yang, Yahoo Chief, Steps Down
